official_title: A concurrent resolution to urge the government of the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of certain Soviet citizens, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Urges the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of certain named Soviet citizens who are married to citizens of Western countries and who have begun a hunger strike to protest the Soviet refusal to allow them to emigrate. Expresses U. S. support and sympathy to the families of the hunger strikers and to the families of others who have attempted to obtain and been denied exit visas.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to urge the government of the Soviet Union to facilitate the emigration of certain Soviet citizens, and for other purposes.
